snippet.title: ARC Raiders Just Changed Forever | Major Exploits Fixed & New Map Variant | Update 1.4
snippet.description:
Raiders, it's a good day to be topside because ARC Raiders patch 1.4 dropped out of nowhere on Thanksgiving of all days, bringing a new arc raiders update. This video covers all the major exploit fixes and major content updates that aim to help make your raids much more enjoyable.
